sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"集中，聚集"之意。
means: concentrate ： 指把人或物集中在一起，也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
focus ： 侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点，也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

word_mean: 〔复foci〕焦点，聚光点：光线或声波的会聚点
病灶：疾病过程的主要中心
组织或器官遭受致病因子的作用而引起病变的部位。

sentence.Network_cn: 在背景部分，我们可以看到他妻子面带微笑的蒙影像。

sentence.Network_en: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

encyclopedia.content: 英文含义 英文意思： 焦点，现在在产品中代表优秀。 魔兽争霸3职业选手选手简介 韩国电子竞技魔兽争霸3职业选手 和Shy组成的2V2组合是世界最好的2V2之一，2008年的WC3L第15赛季获得冠军，在SOLO方面成绩也很突出。APM非常高一直是他的标志，平均可达350以上。 曾效力战队：WE；NoA；MYM；Fnatic；Wicked；Mojawi) 现效力战队：B.EV) 姓名： Hyosub Eom 出生日期： 1989年2月3日 居住地： asnan ，韩国 种族：兽族 婚姻状况：单身

entry.def: If you focus on a particular topic or if your attention is focused on it, you concentrate on it and think about it, discuss it, or deal with it, rather than dealing with other topics.

example.ex: The research effort has focused on tracing the effects of growing levels of five compounds...
example.tran: 研究重点追踪了5种化合物含量上升的影响。

example.ex: He is currently focusing on assessment and development...
example.tran: 他目前在关注评估和发展。

entry.def: The focus of something is the main topic or main thing that it is concerned with.

example.ex: The UN's role in promoting peace is increasingly the focus of international attention...
example.tran: 联合国在促进和平方面的作用越来越受到国际社会的关注。

example.ex: The new system is the focus of controversy...
example.tran: 这个新体制是争议的焦点。

entry.def: Your focus on something is the special attention that you pay it.

example.ex: He said his sudden focus on foreign policy was not motivated by presidential politics...
example.tran: 他说他突然关注外交政策并非受总统政治的驱使。

example.ex: The report's focus is on how technology affects human life rather than business...
example.tran: 这个报告关注的是技术如何影响人类生活而非商业活动。

entry.def: If you say that something has a focus, you mean that you can see a purpose in it.

example.ex: Somehow, though, their latest album has a focus that the others have lacked...
example.tran: 但是，他们的最新专辑设法找到了其他专辑所欠缺的一种目的性。

example.ex: Suddenly all of the bizarre and seemingly isolated examples took on a meaningful focus.
example.tran: 突然之间，所有那些怪异且看上去孤立的例子都具有了意义。

entry.tran: 注视;使(相机、望远镜等)聚焦;给…调焦
entry.def: If you focus your eyes or if your eyes focus, your eyes adjust so that you can clearly see the thing that you want to look at. If you focus a camera, telescope, or other instrument, you adjust it so that you can see clearly through it.

example.ex: Kelly couldn't focus his eyes well enough to tell if the figure was male or female...
example.tran: 凯利没有看清楚那个人影到底是男的还是女的。

example.ex: His eyes slowly began to focus on what looked like a small dark ball...
example.tran: 他的眼睛慢慢开始看清楚那个看上去像是个小黑球的东西。

entry.def: You use focus to refer to the fact of adjusting your eyes or a camera, telescope, or other instrument, and to the degree to which you can see clearly.

example.ex: His focus switched to the little white ball...
example.tran: 他把关注点转移到那个小白球上。

example.ex: Together these factors determine the depth of focus...
example.tran: 这些因素综合起来决定了景深。

entry.def: If you focus rays of light on a particular point, you pass them through a lens or reflect them from a mirror so that they meet at that point.

example.ex: Magnetic coils focus the electron beams into fine spots.
example.tran: 磁线圈把电子束聚焦成微小的点。

entry.def: The focus of a number of rays or lines is the point at which they meet.

entry.tran: (图像)清晰;(照相机、望远镜等)对准焦点
entry.def: If an image or a camera, telescope, or other instrument is in focus, the edges of what you see are clear and sharp.

example.ex: Pictures should be in focus, with realistic colours and well composed groups.
example.tran: 照片应该图像清晰，颜色逼真，构图合理。

entry.tran: 受关注;在讨论;(目的和性质)清楚的，明白的
entry.def: If something is in focus, it is being discussed or its purpose and nature are clear.

example.ex: This aggression is the real issue the world should be concerned about. We want to keep that in focus...
example.tran: 这次侵略才是世界应该关注的真正问题。我们想继续保持关注。

example.ex: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
example.tran: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

entry.def: If an image or a camera, telescope, or other instrument is out of focus, the edges of what you see are unclear.

example.ex: In some of the pictures the subjects are out of focus while the background is sharp.
example.tran: 一些照片背景很清晰，被摄主体却因失焦而显得模糊。

example.ex: ...a lot of out-of-focus photographs.
example.tran: 许多对焦不实的照片

entry.tran: 不受关注;(目的和性质)不清晰的
entry.def: If something is out of focus, it is not being discussed or its purpose or nature is not clear.

example.ex: The deficit in the US balance of payments put these considerations out of focus...
example.tran: 美国的国际收支逆差使这些因素没有得到关注。

example.ex: The movement towards democracy in Latin America and the foreign debt problems that have plagued it have gone out of focus.
example.tran: 拉丁美洲的民主运动和困扰该地区的外债问题已经淡出人们的视线。

means.word_mean: 1. the concentration of attention or energy on something;

sentences.sentence: "the focus of activity shifted to molecular biology"
"he had no direction in his life"

means.word_mean: 2. maximum clarity or distinctness of an image rendered by an optical system;
3. maximum clarity or distinctness of an idea;

sentences.sentence: "the controversy brought clearly into focus an important difference of opinion"

means.word_mean: 4. a central point or locus of an infection in an organism;

sentences.sentence: "the stress was more on accuracy than on speed"

means.word_mean: 6. a point of convergence of light (or other radiation) or a point from which it diverges
7. a fixed reference point on the concave side of a conic section

sentences.sentence: "Please focus on your studies and not on your hobbies"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to converge on or toward a central point;
3. bring into focus or alignment; to converge or cause to converge; of ideas or emotions
4. become focussed or come into focus;

sentences.sentence: "Please focus the image; we cannot enjoy the movie"

auth_sentence.content: Edward's primary focus was now war with France.
auth_sentence.res_content: Edward's primary focus was now war with France.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Edward's primary focus was now war with France.

auth_sentence.content: It wants them to focus more on competitive sport.
auth_sentence.res_content: It wants them to focus more on competitive sport.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It wants them to focus more on competitive sport.

auth_sentence.content: The Italian expects the same focus from his players.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Italian expects the same focus from his players.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Italian expects the same focus from his players.

Sentence.sentence: By focusing on the notes in the margins.

Decades ago, Kodak anticipated that digital photography would overtake film — and in fact, Kodak invented the first digital camera in 1975 — but in a fateful decision, the company chose to shelf its new discovery to focus on its traditional film business
In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture.

A recent article in The Harvard Crimson noted the shocking growth of Harvard's public relations arm in the last five years and it questioned whether a focus on risk management and avoiding controversy was really the best outward-looking face of this great institution.
What does the author think a prestigious university like Harvard should focus on

A man who had recently reconciled with his brother told Gold there's something that lets older people to put aside bad deeds of the past and focus a little on what we need now, especially when it's sisters and brothers.

means.word_mean: 【物理学】焦点；【光学】(镜头的)焦点，焦距; 聚焦，对焦点，对光；成像清晰点

sentences.en: She was the focus of everyone's attention.
The beams of light moved across the sky and focused on the aircraft.
sentences.cn: 光束穿过天空，射向飞机。

jushi.english: A defect of vision prevented him from focusing accurately.
jushi.chinese: 视力缺陷使他无法准确聚焦。

jushi.english: He must be very tired today, he doesn't seem to focus at all.
jushi.chinese: 他今天一定很累,他似乎无法专心思考。

jushi.english: His eyes were so tired that he had difficulty focusing it.
jushi.chinese: 他的眼睛累了,无法准确聚焦。
